items.sentence: I'm just kidding. That really didn't happen.
Can you help me pick out an engagement ring?
It was a mistake to keep that matter secret.
Some of what you said didn't sound truthful.
A black SUV pulled up in front of the hotel.
We need to get back before it gets too late.
Tom felt that something was about to happen.
I have a lot more money than I'll ever need.
Did Tom spend all of the money you gave him?
That isn't the only thing that I have to do.
Could you show me what you bought yesterday?
I tried to do that the day before yesterday.
I don't think it's good for Tom to go alone.
We're still hoping that Tom will get better.
The shirt you're wearing is really wrinkled.
Things won't be getting better anytime soon.
Tom and Mary have had a lot of fun together.
I can't believe my eyes. Is that really you?
The children will wake up if you make noise.
Tom doesn't have to go to bed early tonight.
I think that I'll be able to deal with that.
Don't you think that you can do that for us?
Do you think that Tom could help us do that?
I think that you could do that if you tried.
The police asked Tom to describe the mugger.
I'm glad that Tom is taking care of himself.
No one was more frustrated than Tom himself.
Nobody was more frustrated than Tom himself.
Tom is sure that he'll never see Mary again.
This isn't the first time I've been bullied.
This song has been recorded by many singers.
Tom told me he had a rare medical condition.
I'm not sure if it's Tom who should do that.
I'd expected Tom to do that on October 20th.
I wondered if Tom should do that by himself.
I wondered if Tom had to do that by himself.
Tom made it clear that he wanted to do that.
I haven't spoken with anyone about that yet.
Tom died without telling anybody his secret.
Could you keep it down? I'm trying to study.
Doing that will set you back thirty dollars.
Tom doesn't remember what he did last night.
This isn't the first time Tom has done this.
There was no return address on the envelope.
Tom has just finished reading the newspaper.
Were you the one who told Tom we'd be there?
Tom is one of the luckiest guys that I know.

Although Tom lives nearby, I rarely see him.
You can see the setting sun from the window.
